io.github.bosifullstack.textAdventure.characterCreation

Class PlayerSpreadsheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.bosifullstack.textAdventure.characterCreation.Character
      • io.github.bosifullstack.textAdventure.characterCreation.PlayerSpreadsheet

  • public class PlayerSpreadsheet
extends Character
    Creates a player spreadsheet necessary for the playeable Character to exist.

        public PlayerSpreadsheet(String name,
                         String race,
                         String className,
                         int strength,
                         int dexterity,
                         int constitution,
                         int intelligence,
                         int wisdom,
                         int charisma,
                         ArrayList<Magic> magics,
                         ArrayList<Item> items,
                         MagicType elementalWeakness)
        Creates a PlayerSpreadsheet
        Parameters:
        name - String - Name of the character
        race - String - Race of the character
        className - String - Class of the character
        strength - int - Character strength
        dexterity - int - Character dexterity
        constitution - int - Character constitution
        intelligence - int - Character intelligence
        wisdom - int - Character wisdom
        charisma - int - Character charisma
        magics - ArrayList of Magic - List of all magics that this player knows
        items - ArrayList of Item - List of all of the player's items
        elementalWeakness - MagicType - Character elemental
